abstract: The publisher said it would make about 5,000 titles available for purchase as the book industry sought alternatives to Amazon’s Kindle store.
snippet: The publisher said it would make about 5,000 titles available for purchase as the book industry sought alternatives to Amazon’s Kindle store.
lead_paragraph: In another sign that book publishers are looking to embrace alternatives to Amazon.com’s Kindle e-book store, Simon & Schuster has agreed to sell digital copies of its books on Scribd.com, a popular document-sharing Web site.

headline.main: Simon & Schuster to Sell Digital Books on Scribd.com
headline.print_headline: Simon & Schuster to Sell Digital Books on Scribd.com
